title: (x) Jackie Brown movie logo - ITC Tiffany Heavy (customised) {Petros Ratisidis}
content:
[http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/jackiebrown.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080530/http:/i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/jackiebrown.jpg "http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/jackiebrown.jpg")

Leaving the custom chance alone, I had many hopes I could find this in a font or anything similar. Pllllleeeeease, anyone? Thanks a lot! xxx

| --- | --- |
| [jackiebrown.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080530/http:/typophile.com/files/jackiebrown.jpg) | 71.38 KB |
author: icantgetenough

comments.content:
That's really cool! I've never looked at it closely, and always just assumed it was Caslon Swash Heavy.

For a close alternative, check out [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080530/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000060).

- Lex
